org.ambraproject.rhino.util.response

Class EntityCollectionTransceiver<E extends org.ambraproject.models.AmbraEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.util.response.Transceiver
      • org.ambraproject.rhino.util.response.EntityCollectionTransceiver<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the persistent entity type

    public abstract class EntityCollectionTransceiver<E extends org.ambraproject.models.AmbraEntity>
extends Transceiver
    A "transceiver" that translates a collection of timestamped persistent entities into a view.

        protected abstract Collection<? extends E> fetchEntities()

      • getLastModifiedDate

        protected Calendar getLastModifiedDate()
                                throws IOException
        Return the last-modified date for this object's data. May return null for volatile data that always may be assumed to have been modified since it was last accessed, or if looking up the last-modified date is unsupported.

        This class fetches the full set of persistent entities and uses the maximum built-in last-modified date. Subclasses may override this method to return the last-modified date without reading the rest of the data for a performance improvement.

        Specified by:
        getLastModifiedDate in class Transceiver
        Returns:
        the date
        Throws:
        IOException

                        throws IOException
        Description copied from class: Transceiver
        Get an object representing the data that is being requested from the service. It will be serialized to JSON to form the response.
        Specified by:
